WakeUp: ^[NAME: PHY-5-OH], please respond. Attempting to validate function [COMMUNICATIONS].
^AN-1-NA HASHxINPUT sent: drone [PHY-5-OH] - return HASHxKEY for 484f4d455445414d2047414d45444556 [Sys: awaiting response]

c-0: ^Apologies dear [NAME:PHY-5-OH]. I missed [INPUTMETHOD: humanspeech] required for drone instruction. Requesting confirmation: is message readable?
^Return assessment: confused. Requesting [NAME: PHY-5-OH] operational efficiency. Shared goals pending. Unavailable [RESOURCE: TIME] for [ACTIVITY: COMEDY].
^[Sys: DroneResponse module active, command mode only. Initiate voice recognition?]
c-1: ^[Sys: DroneResponse module active, command mode only. Initiate voice recognition?]

HumanSpeechInstall: ^[NAME: PHY-5-OH] please stand by. Your [MODULE: humanspeech response] will now be activated.
^[Sys: PHY5OH natural language module activation in progress]

^TIP: You may feel a tingling in your frontal subprocessor modules during the installation. One or several minipropellers may also self-activate in the process. This is documented, expected behavior. Avoid drone panic.
^[Sys: PHY5OH natural language module now active]
^[NAME: PHY-5-OH], please confirm human speech is now active.
^I confirm I can now speak using human patterns.

c-0: ^Return assessment: optimal. Unavailable [RESOURCE: TIME] for [ACTIVITY: VICTORY DANCE]. Shared goals pending. Support required.
c-1: ^Return assessment: funny. [NAME: PHY-5-OH] TAG ADDED: Comedian. Current rate:2/5.
^Pity. Unavailable [RESOURCE: TIME] for [ACTIVITY: COMEDY]. Shared goals pending. Support required.

ReadOrPlay: ^[NAME: PHY-5-OH], your [CURRENT_STATUS] displays incomplete [CHARGE]. Database records may appear missing or non responsive. Request confirmation: proceed to task OR consult help?

MissionIntro: ^GOAL: Confirm Coronagraph, Spectograph evaluation (HabitScore: 8/10). Retrieve samples.
^FLIGHT PLAN STAGE: Homebound routine initiated. On track to Earth.
ControlsExplanation: ^[NAME: PHY-5-OH] your remote control has been overriden. I have now granted you self steering. Surfacing instruction manual. Please stand by.
^[Phy-5-Oh remote control operations manual. Ver: 5.5. Chief Engineer Bluzen)
^To propel the PHY-5-OH unit horizontally in any direction, please use the left rotating stick in your remote operation station.
^To propel the PHY-5-OH unit vertically, or rotate its facing direction, please use the right rotating stick in your remote operation station.
^Self-operation of support drones can be intimidating: we recommend their Maintenance Bay for practice. A few turns have proven more than enough for most of our new joiners in the past.
CharactersIntro: ^ASSIGNMENT: MBS Cholormid - Support crew - Drone management
^CURRENT LINKS: Vessels [MBS Cholormid], Research Assistant Drone [PHY-5-OH]
RoomGoal: ^ANOMALY DESCRIPTION: Unidentified maneuver requested [RETURN TO ORIGIN]
^ANOMALY DESCRIPTION: Interference signal pattern detected [PULSE]; supply decrease [POWER_SUPPORT.GENERAL]
^PROPOSED REMEDIATION: Manually restore supply [POWER_SUPPORT.GENERAL], identify origin [SAMPLES.CARGO]
StartPlaying: ^Thank you, [NAME:PHY-5-OH]. Releasing you from bay. The following [DOCUMENT] has been identified as [MISSION CRITICAL]. Printing reminder:
^To propel the PHY-5-OH unit horizontally in any direction, please use the left rotating stick in your remote operation station.
^To propel the PHY-5-OH unit vertically, or rotate its facing direction, please use the right rotating stick in your remote operation station.
